## ProgramBuilder.determinant() method

Same as determinant builtin function in GLSL and WGSL, only valid for WebGL2 and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
determinant(mat: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mat | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
